principal.title: Trending words API/UI
principal.description: A platform for developers and businesses to programmatically access and analyze trending words in the news. It features a secure, user-friendly frontend dashboard built with modern web technologies, and a robust backend powered by a Spring Boot API developed in Java. The entire system is containerized with Docker and deployed on Google Cloud, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and ease of access.

principal.title: Trending words
principal.description: A modular NLP platform that scrapes news, classifies content by topic and sentiment using AI models (TensorFlow, spaCy), and analyzes trending nouns. It stores and processes data with MongoDB, offers a prediction pipeline using LSTM models. Designed for scalability and media analysis, it enables real-time insights into language and content trends.

principal.title: The Pokemon APP
principal.description: Pokémon-themed web app letting users explore, search, and view information about various Pokémon. It features components for displaying Pokémon cards, evolution details, and a chat assistant for interactive queries. The app includes a search engine, recently viewed tracking, and type-based color theming. It uses modern web technologies and delivers a visually engaging, interactive experience for Pokémon fans.
